entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimistic concurrency exception from stored procedure logs error #29135

Closed

  • Add foreign key to existing property with converter and explicit column name #29050
  • EF 7 RC1 - The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Guid' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Guid]' #29120
  • SqlException: EFCore thinks I am trying to identity insert when I never manually set the primary key. #29040

PullRequests

Created

  • Async fix for "Generate values for PK properties that are also self-referencing FK properties" #29134
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Don't fixup to deleted entities #29133
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Don't scaffold HasColumnOrder #29126
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
